channel.title: Npcs on Moonfall Sessions
channel.description: Recent content in Npcs on Moonfall Sessions

item.title: Sol
item.description: An enormous dragon with starlight scales who guards the astral tree portal and tests those seeking to undergo the Skyhammer trials

item.title: Zeke
item.description: An Eldoran Empire spy who murdered Red’s adoptive parents and has been monitoring Goliath activities in the mountains

item.title: Roscoe
item.description: A bizarre Warforged with a makeshift digestive system who serves as an alcoholic oracle and guide in Milstrom’s underground tunnels

item.title: Mr. Crowley
item.description: A mysterious fae entity who appears at crossroads to make dangerous bargains, collecting powerful magical artifacts and targeting supernatural beings

item.title: Eleanor
item.description: A halfling hedge mage who leads Eleanor’s Wandering Coven and specializes in closing infernal portals and combating demonic corruption

item.title: George
item.description: Olivia Cooper’s grandson who works with the Twilight Company on Project Purple Patch, investigating supernatural threats and planar instabilities
